update `pet-adoption`.bulletin
contacts_name = #{contactsName},
contacts_phone = #{contactsPhone},
contacts_wechat = #{contactsWechat},
contacts_email = #{contactsEmail},
location = #{location},
title = #{title},
text = #{text},
bulletin_status = #{bulletinStatus},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified}
where bulletin_id = #{bulletinId}

update `pet-adoption`.pet
pet_name = #{petName},
pet_type = #{petType},
pet_sex = #{petSex},
is_free = #{isFree},
is_sterilization = #{isSterilization},
pet_health_status = #{petHealthStatus},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified}
where pet_id = #{petId}
mapper.select: select * from `pet-adoption`.pet pet join `pet-adoption`.bulletin b on b.bulletin_id = pet.bulletin_id join `pet-adoption`.picture p on p.pic_id = pet.picture_id where pet.is_delete = 0 and b.is_delete = 0 and b.bulletin_status = 1 order by b.gmt_create

select * from `pet-adoption`.pet join `pet-adoption`.bulletin b on b.bulletin_id = pet.bulletin_id join `pet-adoption`.picture p on p.pic_id = pet.picture_id where pet.pet_id = #{petId} and pet.is_delete = 0 and b.is_delete = 0

select * from `pet-adoption`.pet join `pet-adoption`.bulletin b on b.bulletin_id = pet.bulletin_id join `pet-adoption`.picture p on p.pic_id = pet.picture_id where pet_type = #{type} and pet.is_delete = 0 and b.is_delete = 0 and b.bulletin_status = 1 order by b.gmt_modified
mapper.insert: insert into `pet-adoption`.pet(bulletin_id, picture_id, pet_name, pet_type, pet_health_status, is_sterilization, gmt_create, gmt_modified) value (#{bulletinId}, #{pictureId}, #{petName}, #{petType}, #{petHealthStatus}, #{isSterilization}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.select: select * from `pet-adoption`.bulletin b join `pet-adoption`.account a on a.account_id = b.account_id join `pet-adoption`.pet on b.bulletin_id = pet.bulletin_id join `pet-adoption`.picture p on pet.picture_id = p.pic_id where b.account_id = #{id} and b.is_delete = 0 and pet.is_delete = 0 and a.account_status = 1 and a.is_delete = 0 order by b.gmt_create
